text:
I was able to figure this out by reading this tutorial <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-with-modules#customize-the-testimonial-module-in-the-template->. For anyone running into this issue change your code to this.

"default" : {
    "src" : "{{ get_asset_url('../images/hero-banner.jpg') }}",
    "alt" : "",
    "width" : "1440",
    "height" : "683"
  }
